flare_pearls.name: Flare Pearls
flare_pearls.desc: Concentrated sunlight in the form of beautiful pearls.

solar_feathers.name: Solar Feathers
solar_feathers.desc: The featherlike outer parts of an elder sunsnake.

sunstream_missile.name: Sunstream Missile
sunstream_missile.desc: A solar vortex that can somehow still be shot down.

sunfang.name: Sunfang
sunfang.desc: The snapping jaws of a sunsnake. Potent initially, but low damage over time.

sunswarm.name: Sunswarm
sunswarm.desc: Numerous hatchlings emerge when an elder sunsnake fades away.

sunscale.name: Sunscale
sunscale.desc: Glowing scales of a sunsnake. Part of what makes them so hard to target.

sunfeathers.name: Sunfeathers
sunfeathers.desc: The final form of a sunsnake's outer layer. Normally it would soon crumble, but once removed from its host, it lasts forever.

sunhalo.name: Sunhalo
sunhalo.desc: A kind of protective glow around sunsnakes.
